did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: Papers include a scrapbook and a photograph album containing photographs, ephemera, and news clippings documenting James Sweeney's undergraduate life at Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio) from 1930-1934.

bioghist.head: Biography of James Sweeney
bioghist.p: James M. Sweeney, Jr. was from Columbus, Ohio. He attended Holy Rosary High School before attending Xavier University (Cincinnati, Ohio) from 1930-1934. According to the 1934 Musketeer yearbook, Sweeney was a member of the football team and belonged to several student groups, including the Sodality, Masque Society, Philopedian Society, Junior Prom Committee, and the Xavierian News. He also played basketball during his second year (1931-1932 season). Sweeney graduated from Xavier in 1934. Sweeney died in 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers include a scrapbook and a photograph album contain photographs, ephemera, and news clippings documenting James Sweeney's undergraduate life at Xavier University from 1930-1934. The photograph album is chiefly comprised of photographs, clippings, and ephemera highlighting Sweeney's contributions as a member of the football team and also contains photographs of other students, faculty members, and campus buildings. The scrapbook is mostly comprised of ephemera such as postcards, invitations, programs, schedules, and clippings from his participation in student groups and activities.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Scrapbook and photograph album are in original order.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for use. Access to materials is by appointment only. Contact the University Archives Librarian for an appointment.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: This collection is the physical property of Xavier University. Copyright status is unknown. Copyright law of the United States governs the reproduction of copyrighted material. Patrons are responsible for determining the appropriate use or reuse of materials.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of Item, Box Number, XUA-99 James Sweeney Student Papers, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transfer from Division of University Relations, XUA-2017-020 and transfer from the Office of the President, XUA-2005-001. Both were donated to the university after 1991 by Brian Sweeney.
